flavor: This is horrible! And adorable!

name: Ramkahen Wildtamer
text: Battlecry: Copy a random Beast in your hand.
flavor: She gets to decide what cards go to the Hall of Fame.

name: Salhet's Pride
text: Deathrattle: Draw two\n1-Health minions from your_deck.
flavor: Pride cometh before the maul.

name: Vulpera Scoundrel
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell or pick a mystery choice.
flavor: A spell is a spell, but the mystery choice could be anything! (It's also a spell.)

name: Weaponized Wasp
text: Battlecry: If you control\na Lackey, deal 3_damage.
flavor: Dr. Boom had one simple request: wasps with flippin' laser beams attached to their heads.

name: Wretched Reclaimer
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a friendly\nminion, then return it to life\nwith full Health.
flavor: "Ok, here's the plan. We kill you, then bring you back." "Stronger?" "No, about the same."

name: Ancestral Guardian
text: Lifesteal\nReborn
flavor: No one knows whose ancestor he is, but he's still upset that you never call.

name: Body Wrapper
text: Battlecry: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Shuffle it into your deck.
flavor: She uses pickle slices for the eyes. Keeps them well-preserved.

name: Bone Wraith
text: Taunt\nReborn
flavor: It uses only the eco-friendly bones from free-range humanoids.

name: Conjured Mirage
text: Taunt\nAt the start of your turn, shuffle this minion into your deck.
flavor: What you see is Isiset.

name: Diseased Vulture
text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, summon a random\n3-Cost minion.
flavor: He's off the twig! He's kicked the bucket! THIS IS AN EX-VULTURE!

name: Garden Gnome
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na spell that costs (5) or more,\nsummon two 2/2 Treants.
flavor: "Greetings, my little shrubs... It's whittlin' time."

name: High Priest Amet
text: [x]Whenever you summon a\nminion, set its Health equal\nto this minion's.
flavor: All minions are equal, but some minions are more equal than others.

name: Hyena Alpha
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na Secret, summon two\n2/2 Hyenas.
flavor: Everything the sun touches is ours—so long as it's already dead.

name: Impbalming
text: Destroy a minion. Shuffle 3 Worthless Imps into your deck.
flavor: With your complexion, Imp Balm is a great demonizer.

name: Psychopomp
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game. Give it Reborn.
flavor: "Come with me if you want to re-live."

name: Restless Mummy
text: Rush\nReborn
flavor: Life-separation anxiety syndrome.

name: Sahket Sapper
text: Deathrattle: Return a _random enemy minion to_ your_opponent's_hand.
flavor: "Here, you dropped this."

name: Shadow of Death
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 'Shadows' into your deck that summon a copy when drawn.
flavor: Making new friends takes skill.

name: Splitting Axe
text: Battlecry: Summon copies of your Totems.
flavor: The ancient shaman chant, "Control Axe, Control Vee."

name: Sunstruck Henchman
text: At the start of your turn, this has a 50% chance to_fall asleep.
flavor: There is E.V.I.L. here that DOES sleep.

name: Vessina
text: While you're Overloaded, your other minions have +2 Attack.
flavor: She wasn't happy when Hagatha sent her back to Uldum. But her "angry" hiss sounds like her "happy" hiss, so no one knew the difference.

name: Anka, the Buried
text: Battlecry: Change each Deathrattle minion in your hand into a 1/1 that costs (1).
flavor: "You look familiar. Were you at my first funeral?"

name: Anubisath Defender
text: Taunt. Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
flavor: Also comes running when he hears a can opener.

name: Bazaar Mugger
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Add a random minion from another class to your hand.
flavor: Premium muggings at a discount price.

name: Cloud Prince
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 6 damage.
flavor: "In West Cloudidelphia, born and raised; flinging lightning for the rest of my days."

name: Dark Pharaoh Tekahn
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Lackeys are 4/4.
flavor: He'll get that League of Explorers and their little murloc too!

name: Desert Obelisk
text:
[x]If you control 3 of these
at the end of your turn,
deal 5 damage to a
random enemy.
flavor: The Obelisk of the Stars can hide an entire land from prying eyes! Or zap a rando.

name: Elise the Enlightened
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, duplicate your hand.
flavor: From cartographer to combatant, Elise has taken the road less traveled—because no one else could find it on a map.

name: Faceless Lurker
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Double this minion's Health.
flavor: Longtime lurker, first time attacker.

name: Mortuary Machine
text: After your opponent plays a minion, give it Reborn.
flavor: The ankle bone's connected to the shin bone. The knuckle bone's connected to the... eh, it'll be fine.

name: Naga Sand Witch
text: [x]Battlecry: Change the Cost\nof spells in your hand to (5).
flavor: 5 mana footlong, anyone?

name: Oasis Surger
text: Rush\nChoose One - Gain +2/+2; or Summon a copy of this minion.
flavor: Surge's up, dude!

name: Phalanx Commander
text: Your Taunt minions\nhave +2 Attack.
flavor: Turns out he's really good at herding cats.

name: Plague of Wrath
text: Destroy all damaged minions.
flavor: "Thanks, I HATE it!"

name: Sandhoof Waterbearer
text: At the end of your turn, restore #5 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavor: Used to carrying for his team.

name: Wasteland Assassin
text: Stealth\nReborn
flavor: They'll never see me coming, what with my glowing body, eyes and daggers.

name: Armagedillo
text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: We may never know what provoked it, but we will never forget the consequences.

name: Armored Goon
text: Whenever your hero attacks, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Armored except for non-critical areas, such as the head, torso, fists and thighs.

name: Blatant Decoy
text: [x]Deathrattle: Each player\nsummons the lowest Cost\nminion from their hand.
flavor: "Hah! You is being tricked by ME! Togwaggle!"

name: Hidden Oasis
text: Choose One - Summon a 6/6 Ancient with Taunt; or Restore #12 Health.
flavor: Amazing that it's been hidden, given the twenty-foot treant splashing around in it.

name: Khartut Defender
text: [x]Taunt, Reborn\nDeathrattle: Restore #3\nHealth to your hero.
flavor: Gesundheit!

name: Pharaoh's Blessing
text: Give a minion +4/+4, Divine Shield, and Taunt.
flavor: Life hack: Sneeze near a pharaoh.

name: Reno the Relicologist
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavor: All his life, Reno Jackson was only a gatling wand away from becoming the greatest and most terrifying mage who ever existed.

name: Riftcleaver
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Your hero takes damage equal to its Health.
flavor: Brings you face to face with your destructive impulses.

name: Scarlet Webweaver
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random Beast in your_hand by (5).
flavor: Isn't that nice? The spider made the explorer a sleeping bag!

name: Swarm of Locusts
text: Summon seven 1/1 Locusts with Rush.
flavor: Good things never come in swarms.

name: Wild Bloodstinger
text: Battlecry: Summon a minion from your opponent's hand. Attack it.
flavor: Tame Bloodstingers would politely invite your minion to tea.

name: Earthquake
text: Deal $5 damage to all minions, then deal $2 damage to all minions.
flavor: Shake it, sh-sh-sh-shake it like a Kalimdor fissure.

name: Overflow
text: Restore #5 Health\nto all characters.\nDraw 5 cards.
flavor: It's a high five followed by a low tide.

name: Siamat
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush,\nTaunt, Divine Shield, or\nWindfury (your choice).
flavor: TAUNT. TAUNT.

name: Wasteland Scorpid
text: Poisonous
flavor: After they get to a certain size, it doesn't matter if they're poisonous or not.

name: Wrapped Golem
text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
flavor: The end result of one of the greatest wrap battles of all time.

name: Dinotamer Brann
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon King Krush.
flavor: Brann's new dino-taming hobby is going well—his pet can already make him sit, stand, and roll over!

name: Octosari
text: Deathrattle: Draw 8 cards.
flavor: Eight arms of sand-flinging, foe-wringing, card-slinging fury!

name: Pit Crocolisk
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage.
flavor: PIT! Not PET!

name: Tip the Scales
text: Summon 7 Murlocs from your deck.
flavor: Hold on, I need to get some murlocs to weigh in on this.

name: Tomb Warden
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
flavor: Also known as an ancient copy machine.

name: Tortollan Pilgrim
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell\nin your deck and cast it\nwith random targets.
flavor: A tortollan made it to the desert!

name: Anubisath Warbringer
text: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +3/+3.
flavor: Some dogs will bring you a bone or a squeaky toy. This one brings war!

name: Mogu Fleshshaper
text: [x]Rush. Costs (1) less for each\nminion on the battlefield.
flavor: He's here to shape *clap* you up!

name: Plague of Death
text: Silence and destroy all_minions.
flavor: Don't worry, there's a happy little funhouse right under that sand pit.

name: Colossus of the Moon
text: Divine Shield\nReborn
flavor: Strike him down, and you'll face the Colossus of the New Moon.

name: King Phaoris
text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
flavor: When you're the king of the cats, the whole desert is your litterbox.

name: Living Monument
text: Taunt
flavor: This is not the greatest card in the world. This is just a monument.

name: Puzzle Box of Yogg-Saron
text: Cast 10 random spells (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: "PUT THE BOX DOWN, RENO!"

name: Forbidden Words
text: [x]Spend all your Mana.\nDestroy a minion with that\nmuch Attack or less.
flavor: Please confirm your age before reading this flavor text.

name: Lazul's Scheme
text: Reduce the Attack of an enemy minion by\n@ until your next turn. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "What's that you're dreaming?\nYou're weak and you're screaming!\nIt must be my scheming..."

name: Mutate
text: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
flavor: You'll get the transformation you want when murlocs fly.

name: Acornbearer
text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Squirrels to your hand.
flavor: You’d be nuts to mess with the squirrel squad.

name: Crystal Power
text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage to a minion; or_Restore #5 Health.
flavor: Often used as healing crystals, but also good for throwing at people.

name: Daring Escape
text: Return all friendly minions to your hand.
flavor: Impossible to cast without cackling evilly.

name: Desperate Measures
text: Twinspell\nCast a random Paladin Secret.
flavor: Desperate times call for disparate secrets.

name: Improve Morale
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: "The beatings will continue until MY morale improves."

name: Magic Trick
text: Discover a spell that costs (3) or less.
flavor: The world is not ready for an illusion of this depth and intricacy!

name: Never Surrender!
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, give your minions +2_Health.
flavor: But sometimes concede.

name: Potion Vendor
text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: Everyone gets two because that’s all she can hold.

name: Rapid Fire
text: Twinspell\nDeal $1 damage.
flavor: Pew! Pew!

name: Ray of Frost
text: Twinspell Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, deal $2 damage to it.
flavor: If you have zero chill, this can help.

name: Shimmerfly
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Hunter spell to your hand.
flavor: Plenty of buzz around this card.

name: Sludge Slurper
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Overload: (1)
flavor: You can't stop slurping this delicious sludge!

name: Togwaggle's Scheme
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle @ |4(copy, copies) of it into your deck.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "Many minions equals many treasures for king. Kobold arithmetic!"

name: Toxfin
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc Poisonous.
flavor: I'm addicted to him, but I know that he's Toxfin.

name: Arcane Servant
flavor: "Would sir like me to punch something?"

name: Crystalsong Portal
text: Discover a Druid minion. If your hand has no minions, keep all 3.
flavor: Experience the draw of the wild!

name: Dalaran Librarian
text: Battlecry: Silence\nadjacent minions.
flavor: Don't make her raise her "shush"!

name: Dreamway Guardians
text: Summon two 1/2 Dryads with Lifesteal.
flavor: They're a nightmare to deal with.

name: EVIL Cable Rat
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to_your hand.
flavor: Gradually driven to darkness by the promise of unobtainable cheese.

name: EVIL Conscripter
text: Deathrattle: Add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: Kobold! There’s a place you can handle\nI said kobold! When you’re short in the candle\nCast a spell with the E! V! I! L!

name: EVIL Genius
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to add 2 random Lackeys_to_your_hand.
flavor: You do not want to be on the business end of this intellect!

name: Hench-Clan Hogsteed
text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc.
flavor: This is CLEARLY their first rodeo.

name: Keeper Stalladris
text: After you cast a Choose One spell, add copies of both choices_to_your_hand.
flavor: Keeps your choices handy.

name: Khadgar
text: Your cards that summon minions summon twice_as_many.
flavor: "What do you call two minions summoned at once? Twinions, haha! Wait... where are you going?"

name: Lightforged Blessing
text: Twinspell\nGive a friendly minion Lifesteal.
flavor: Some might call this a lightforgery.

name: Magic Dart Frog
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: There's a powerful throat in this frog.

name: Mana Cyclone
text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell you've cast this turn, add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: It'll put a good spin on your spells.

name: Mana Reservoir
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: If it soaks too long, it becomes a reservoir hog.

name: Mysterious Blade
text: Battlecry: If you control a\nSecret, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: It knows every secret you have left.

name: Plot Twist
text: Shuffle your hand\ninto your deck.\nDraw that many cards.
flavor: It’s coming from inside the deck!

name: Shadowy Figure
text: Battlecry: Transform into a_2/2 copy of a friendly Deathrattle minion.
flavor: Terrible at shadow puppets: “This is… a tentacle! And this is… two tentacles!”

name: Soul of the Murloc
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc."
flavor: Previously thought nonexistent.

name: Spellbook Binder
text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, draw a card.
flavor: You're bound to love his work!

name: Sunreaver Spy
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1.
flavor: She's watching. Always watching.

name: Sweeping Strikes
text: Give a minion "Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks."
flavor: Infinitely preferable to mopping strikes.

name: Underbelly Angler
text: After you play a Murloc, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavor: Attracts murlocs… and moths.

name: Underbelly Fence
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na card from another class,\n_gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavor: She’ll take anything you have—except scruples and a good work ethic.

name: Vicious Scraphound
text: Whenever this minion\ndeals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavor: It begs for scraps.

name: Witch's Brew
text: Restore #4 Health. Repeatable this turn.
flavor: The swill has eyes!

name: Zayle, Shadow Cloak
text: You start the game with one of Zayle's EVIL Decks!
flavor: E.V.I.L. is the new black.
howToGetGold: Unlocked by owning all The Dalaran Heist chapters.

name: Arcane Watcher
text: Can't attack unless you have Spell Damage.
flavor: Now his watch has ended… until you have Spell Damage.

name: Blessing of the Ancients
text: Twinspell\nGive your minions +1/+1.
flavor: Arguably the cutest blessing.

name: Bronze Herald
text: Deathrattle: Add two 4/4 Dragons to your hand.
flavor: This is why you shouldn’t shoot the messenger.

name: Call to Adventure
text: Draw the lowest Cost minion from your deck. Give it +2/+2.
flavor: Even the smallest minion can change the outcome of the game.

name: Clockwork Goblin
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
flavor: They always wind up bombing.

name: Commander Rhyssa
text: Your Secrets trigger twice.
flavor: Two people can keep a secret as long as neither of them are Commander Rhyssa.

name: EVIL Miscreant
text: Combo: Add two random Lackeys to your hand.
flavor: Because there are no G.O.O.D. Miscreants.

name: Faceless Rager
text: Battlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Health.
flavor: When you need to rage anonymously.

name: Flight Master
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Gryphon for each player.
flavor: Your gryphon will be summoned following a brief safety demonstration.

name: Hench-Clan Sneak
text: Stealth
flavor: He’d be a lot sneakier if he wasn’t trailing 300 yards of power cable…

name: Impferno
text: Give your Demons +1 Attack. Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Imps don't get mad when you set them on fire. They think it's cozy.

name: Lifeweaver
text: Whenever you restore Health, add a random Druid spell to your hand.
flavor: Lifeweaving is all well and good until it's time to cut the thread.

name: Madame Lazul
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a\ncopy of a card in your\nopponent's hand.
flavor: Of course she knows the future, she’s been looking at your cards the WHOLE TIME!

name: Magic Carpet
text: After you play a 1-Cost minion, give it +1 Attack and Rush.
flavor: Its small yet fierce riders are affectionately known as rug rats.

name: Messenger Raven
text: Battlecry: Discover a\nMage minion.
flavor: You can make a collect CAW!

name: Nine Lives
text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Also trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Beware the night of the living pets!

name: Rafaam's Scheme
text: Summon @ 1/1 |4(Imp, Imps). (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "When your first plan fails... imp-rovise."

name: Spellward Jeweler
text: [x]Battlecry: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers until your next turn.
flavor: The fanciest possible way of distracting enemies with shiny things.

name: Ursatron
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Mech from your deck.
flavor: It's been programmed to include all the bear necessities.

name: Arcane Fletcher
text: [x]Whenever you play a\n1-Cost minion, draw a\nspell from your deck.
flavor: Stop trying to make fletch happen. It's not going to happen.

name: Archmage Vargoth
text: [x]At the end of your turn, cast\na spell you've cast this turn\n(targets are random).
flavor: He's an archmage, but he might want to brush up on the basics... like aiming.

name: Conjurer's Calling
text: Twinspell\nDestroy a minion. Summon 2 minions of the same Cost to replace it.
flavor: If only you’d let it go to voicemail…

name: Dr. Boom's Scheme
text: Gain @ Armor.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: “We did it! We blew up the vault!”\n“You mean the vault door?”\n“Oh. The doooor…”

name: Eager Underling
text: Deathrattle: Give two random friendly minions +2/+2.
flavor: Eager to please, even if it kills him.

name: Hecklebot
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Your opponent summons a minion from their deck.
flavor: Built by goblins, designed by a troll.

name: Hench-Clan Burglar
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class.
flavor: She’s more of a rat burglar.

name: Hench-Clan Hag
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Amalgams with all minion types.
flavor: The Hench Clan is an equal opportunity employer, no matter which parts of you came from where.

name: Hench-Clan Shadequill
text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
flavor: The Hench-Clan has a point.

name: Kirin Tor Tricaster
text: Spell Damage +3\nYour spells cost (1) more.
flavor: The math checks out!

name: Marked Shot
text: Deal $4 damage to_a_minion. Discover_a_spell.
flavor: Obviously it's marked for greatness.

name: Omega Devastator
text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10\nMana Crystals, deal 10\ndamage to a minion.
flavor: The Alpha Devastator didn’t devastate enough. The Beta Devastator devastated too much. But the Omega was just right!

name: Portal Keeper
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavor: No longer allowed to be “it” when playing demon tag.

name: Proud Defender
text: Taunt\nHas +2 Attack while you [x]have no other minions.
flavor: It'll take a humble offender to defeat him.

name: Scargil
text: Your Murlocs cost (1).
flavor: Wanna know how he got those scars? So does he.

name: Soldier of Fortune
text: Whenever this minion attacks, give your opponent a Coin.
flavor: His allies call him invaluable.

name: Traveling Healer
text: [x]Divine Shield\nBattlecry: Restore #3 Health.
flavor: Some heroes have soft hearts and hard shells.

name: Unsleeping Soul
text: Silence a friendly minion, then summon a copy of it.
flavor: It's 3 am. Do you know where your soul is?

name: Vendetta
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you're holding a card from another class.
flavor: A vengeful and vicarious vanguard against violent villains or vexed victims.

name: Violet Spellsword
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack\nfor each spell in your hand.
flavor: If you have to wield a spell and a sword, then neither is performing to expectation.

name: Waggle Pick
text: [x]Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Kobolds informally refer to its effect as a deathwaggle.

name: Wrenchcalibur
text: After your hero attacks, shuffle a Bomb into your [x]opponent's deck.
flavor: Whoso pulleth out this wrench from the toolbox is rightwise king of the lab.

name: Azerite Elemental
text: At the start of your turn, gain Spell Damage +2.
flavor: This is some bad blood.

name: Barista Lynchen
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each of your other Battlecry minions_to_your_hand.
flavor: "Thanks a latte!"

name: Convincing Infiltrator
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Destroy a\n random enemy minion.
flavor: It’s always nice to steal a familiar face.

name: Crystal Stag
text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've restored 5 Health this game, summon a copy of this.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Arrives alone, but usually leaves with a friend just like him.

name: Dalaran Crusader
text: Divine Shield
flavor: Stops for nothing—except donuts.

name: Dragon Speaker
text: Battlecry: Give all Dragons in your hand +3/+3.
flavor: All of his speeches really drag on.

name: Duel!
text: Summon a minion from each player's deck.\nThey fight!
flavor: If you don’t fight to the death, it’s Duel Yielding.

name: Hagatha's Scheme
text: Deal $@ damage\nto all minions.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "All shall suffer!"\n"But Hagatha, those are your minions..."\n"I said ALL!!!"

name: Hunting Party
text: Copy all Beasts in your_hand.
flavor: Not sure I’d call it a good party if everyone ends up beside themselves.

name: Muckmorpher
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform into\na 4/4 copy of a different\nminion in your deck.
flavor: Fan favorite in the muck morphin' sewer strangers.

name: Recurring Villain
text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 4 or more Attack, resummon it.
flavor: Mwahahaha! You'll never catch him this time!

name: Sunreaver Warmage
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, deal 4 damage.
flavor: What, did you expect the Sunreavers to be coldages?

name: Aranasi Broodmother
text: [x]Taunt\nWhen you draw this, restore\n#4 Health to your hero.
flavor: She's got a big brood and a big mood.

name: Darkest Hour
text: Destroy all friendly minions. For each one, summon a random minion from your deck.
flavor: It's always darkest just before you find the light switch.

name: Eccentric Scribe
text: Deathrattle: Summon\nfour 1/1 Vengeful Scrolls.
flavor: Them’s fightin’ words!

name: Heistbaron Togwaggle
text: Battlecry: If you control a_Lackey, choose a fantastic treasure.
flavor: A staunch ally of Rafaam, at least while the shinies keep flowing.

name: Mad Summoner
text: [x]Battlecry: Fill each player's\nboard with 1/1 Imps.
flavor: Does he summon because of his madness, or is he mad from all the summoning?

name: Oblivitron
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\nMech from your hand and\ntrigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Reduce, reuse, re-rattle!

name: Portal Overfiend
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavor: It’s like an interdimensional game of demon tag.

name: Safeguard
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 0/5\nVault Safe with Taunt.
flavor: Keep it secret. Keep it safeguarded!

name: Unidentified Contract
text: Destroy a minion. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: The terms of service are constantly changing.

name: Unleash the Beast
text: Twinspell\nSummon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.
flavor: The Kirin Tor have always been lax in enforcing leash laws.

name: Unseen Saboteur
text: Battlecry: Your opponent casts a random spell from their hand (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Far more effective than the flamboyant saboteur.

name: Violet Warden
text: Taunt\nSpell Damage +1
flavor: He's got magic, a shield, and an unwavering obsession with the color purple.

name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
flavor: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

name: Blastmaster Boom
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1\nBoom Bots for each Bomb\nin your opponent's deck.
flavor: He's gonna fly through the air with the greatest of grease.

name: Chef Nomi
text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, summon six 6/6 Greasefire_Elementals.
flavor: His cooking is always very well done.

name: Exotic Mountseller
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random\n3-Cost Beast.
flavor: *Taps roof of mammoth* “You can fit so many squirrels in this thing!”

name: Swampqueen Hagatha
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a 5/5\nHorror to your hand. Teach\nit two Shaman spells.
flavor: Rafaam mainly enjoys working with Hagatha because she never laughs at Dr. Boom's jokes.

name: Tak Nozwhisker
text: [x]Whenever you shuffle a\ncard into your deck, add\na copy to your hand.
flavor: "One for me and one for future me!"

name: Tunnel Blaster
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Deal 3 damage\nto all minions.
flavor: And you always thought they wore the candles just for fun.

name: Underbelly Ooze
text: After this minion survives damage, summon a copy_of it.
flavor: It's always accepting of the less successful adventurers.

name: Vereesa Windrunner
text: Battlecry: Equip Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury.
flavor: Good things come in threes: Windrunner sisters and arrows of Thori'dal.

name: Batterhead
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may_attack again.
flavor: When it comes to problem-solving, he always uses his head.

name: Catrina Muerte
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nsummon a friendly minion\nthat died this game.
flavor: She always manages to lift your spirits.

name: Fel Lord Betrug
text: [x]Whenever you draw a minion, summon a copy with Rush that dies at end of turn.
flavor: Nobody else likes rush hour.

name: Heroic Innkeeper
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other friendly minion.
flavor: We reserve the right to refuse service to any 1/1.

name: Jepetto Joybuzz
text: Battlecry: Draw 2 minions from your deck. Set their Attack, Health, and Cost to 1.
flavor: “I’m a real toy now!”

name: Lucentbark
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Go Dormant. Restore 5 Health to awaken this minion.
flavor: Always feels refreshed after a little dirt nap.

name: Power of Creation
text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon two copies of it.
flavor: Mostly used for party tricks, to be honest.

name: The Forest's Aid
text: Twinspell\nSummon five 2/2 Treants.
flavor: Delicious Forest’s Aid! Made from real forests.

name: Walking Fountain
text: Lifesteal, Rush, Windfury
flavor: The weirdest part is that it doesn't have legs.

name: Whirlwind Tempest
text: Your minions with Windfury have Mega-Windfury.
flavor: And your minions with mega-windfury get... dizzy.

name: Archivist Elysiana
text: Battlecry: Discover 5 cards. Replace your deck with 2_copies of each.
flavor: Your deck is just another organizational challenge to her.

name: Burly Shovelfist
text: Rush
flavor: Shovel beats paper and rock!

name: Mass Resurrection
text: Summon 3 friendly minions that died\nthis game.
flavor: One's company, two's a crowd, and three's a “mass” resurrection, apparently.

name: Big Bad Archmage
text: At the end of your turn, summon a random\n6-Cost minion.
flavor: "My, my, what big minions I have!"

name: Dimensional Ripper
text: Summon 2 copies of a minion in your deck.
flavor: The first dimensional ripper had a point.\nThe second fell flat.\nThe THIRD one really started to take shape!

name: Jumbo Imp
text: Costs (1) less whenever a friendly Demon dies while this is in your hand.
flavor: Jumbo in size! Huge in E.V.I.L.!

name: Kalecgos
text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

name: Nozari
text: Battlecry: Restore both heroes to full Health.
flavor: In another timeline, she was called Yeszari.

name: The Boom Reaver
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of a minion in your deck. Give it Rush.
flavor: “What’s better than reaving? BOOM reaving!”

name: Circle of Healing
text: Restore #4 Health to ALL_minions.
flavor: It isn't really a circle.

name: Inner Rage
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and give it +2_Attack.
flavor: They're only smiling on the outside.

name: Preparation
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

name: Shadowstep
text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It_costs (2) less.
flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.

name: Silence
text: Silence a minion.
flavor: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

name: Wisp
flavor: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode.   But why?

name: Abusive Sergeant
text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2_Attack this turn.
flavor: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

name: Angry Chicken
text: Has +5 Attack while damaged.
flavor: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.

name: Argent Squire
text: Divine Shield
flavor: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

name: Bestial Wrath
text: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavor: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.

name: Blessing of Wisdom
text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
flavor: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

name: Blood Imp
text: [x] Stealth. At the end of your \nturn, give another random\n friendly minion +1 Health.
flavor: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

name: Bloodsail Corsair
text: [x]Battlecry: Remove\n1 Durability from your\nopponent's weapon.
flavor: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers.  It's called the "Pirate's Code".

name: Call of the Void
text: Add a random Demon to your hand.
flavor:
"Marco!"
"Polo!"
"Marco!"
"Who dares summon me?!"

name: Dust Devil
text: Windfury. Overload: (2)
flavor: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

name: Earth Shock
text: Silence a minion, then deal $1 damage to it.
flavor: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

name: Eye for an Eye
text: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal_that much damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

name: Flame Imp
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

name: Forked Lightning
text: Deal $2 damage to 2_random enemy minions. Overload: (2)
flavor: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

name: Hungry Crab
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Murloc and gain +2/+2.
flavor: Murloc.  It's what's for dinner.

name: Inner Fire
text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
flavor: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

name: Leper Gnome
text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy_hero.
flavor: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.

name: Lightning Bolt
text: Deal $3 damage. Overload: (1)
flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

name: Lightwarden
text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
flavor: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

name: Murloc Tidecaller
text: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

name: Noble Sacrifice
text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
flavor: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

name: Pilfer
text: Add a random card from another class to_your hand.
flavor: The class is always greener on the other side of the board.

name: Redemption
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
flavor: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It’s a mystery!

name: Repentance
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
flavor: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

name: Savagery
text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.
flavor: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.

name: Scarlet Subjugator
text: Battlecry: Give an enemy minion -2 Attack until your_next turn.
flavor: At the Scarlet Monastery, he learned the sacred art of kicking people when they're up.

name: Secretkeeper
text: Whenever a Secret is played, gain +1/+1.
flavor: Where is Mankrik’s wife? She’ll never tell.

name: Shield Slam
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

name: Shieldbearer
text: Taunt
flavor: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game??  This is no easy job.

name: Southsea Deckhand
text: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
flavor: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

name: Tome of Intellect
text: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: Just a compilation of napkins of intellect.

name: Upgrade!
text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
flavor: Easily worth 50 DKP.

name: Worgen Infiltrator
text: Stealth
flavor: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

name: Young Dragonhawk
text: Windfury
flavor: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

name: Young Priestess
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
flavor: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

name: Amani Berserker
text: Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor: If an Amani berserker asks "Joo lookin' at me?!", the correct response is "Nah, mon".

name: Ancestral Spirit
text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
flavor: It was just a flesh wound.

name: Ancient Watcher
text: Can't attack.
flavor: Why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by?

name: Argent Protector
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavor: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs.  I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

name: Armorsmith
text: Whenever a friendly minion_takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

name: Battle Rage
text: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

name: Betrayal
text: Force an enemy minion to deal its damage to the minions next to it.
flavor: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

name: Bloodmage Thalnos
text: Spell Damage +1\nDeathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

name: Bloodsail Raider
text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack\nof your weapon.
flavor: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

name: Cold Blood
text: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
flavor: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"

name: Commanding Shout
text: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.
flavor: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

name: Crazed Alchemist
text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
flavor: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

name: Cruel Taskmaster
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2_Attack.
flavor: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

name: Defias Ringleader
text: Combo: Summon a 2/1 Defias Bandit.
flavor: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

name: Demonfire
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it’s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.
flavor: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP

name: Dire Wolf Alpha
text: Adjacent minions have +1_Attack.
flavor: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

name: Doomsayer
text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
flavor: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

name: Eviscerate
text: Deal $2 damage. Combo: Deal $4 damage instead.
flavor: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent. You might tweak your elbow! That really hurts!

name: Explosive Trap
text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal $2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

name: Faerie Dragon
text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor: Adorable.  Immune to Magic.  Doesn't pee on the rug.  The perfect pet!

name: Flare
text: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.
flavor: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!

name: Freezing Trap
text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

name: Icicle
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it's Frozen, draw a card.
flavor: This may appear weak at frost glance, but it's actually a very ice spell.

name: Knife Juggler
text: [x]After you summon a\nminion, deal 1 damage\nto a random enemy.
flavor: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers.    They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

name: Kul Tiran Chaplain
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: The maritime Kul Tiran clergy are unique among priests for using holy saltwater.

name: Lightwell
text: At the start of your turn, restore #3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavor: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

name: Loot Hoarder
text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: Always roll need.

name: Lorewalker Cho
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a copy into the other player’s hand.
flavor: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.

name: Mad Bomber
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
flavor: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

name: Mana Addict
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: She’s trying to kick the habit, but still takes some mana whenever she has a stressful day.

name: Mana Wraith
text: ALL minions cost (1) more.
flavor: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. "Mmmmmm," they say.

name: Mana Wyrm
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

name: Master Swordsmith
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavor: He's currently trying to craft a "flail-axe", but all the other swordsmiths say it can't be done.

name: Millhouse Manastorm
text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (0) next turn.
flavor: "I'm gonna light you up, sweetcheeks!"

name: Misdirection
text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, instead it attacks another random character.
flavor: Sometimes it's as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else.

name: Nat Pagle
text: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
flavor: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman!  He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

name: Patient Assassin
text: Stealth\n Poisonous
flavor: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

name: Pint-Sized Summoner
text: The first minion you play each turn costs (1) less.
flavor: She's quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.

name: Power of the Wild
text: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.
flavor: Never look a panther in the eye.  Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'?  Well, it's one of those.

name: Rampage
text: Give a damaged minion +3/+3.
flavor: Minion get ANGRY.   Minion SMASH!

name: Scavenging Hyena
text: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
flavor: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything.  Even Brussels sprouts.

name: Slam
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

name: Snake Trap
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.
flavor: Why did it have to be snakes?

name: Snipe
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $4 damage to it.
flavor: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
text: Your spells cost (1) less.
flavor: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

name: Stormforged Axe
text: Overload: (1)
flavor: Yo, that's a nice axe.

name: Sunfury Protector
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Taunt.
flavor: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

name: Thoughtsteal
text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

name: Wild Pyromancer
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

name: Wrath
text: Choose One -\nDeal $3 damage to a minion; or $1 damage\nand draw a card.
flavor: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

name: Youthful Brewmaster
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavor: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews.   Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

name: Alarm-o-Bot
text: [x]At the start of your turn,\nswap this minion with a\n   random one in your hand.
flavor: WARNING.  WARNING.  WARNING.

name: Aldor Peacekeeper
text: Battlecry: Change an_enemy minion's Attack to 1.
flavor: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

name: Arcane Golem
text: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
flavor: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

name: Blood Knight
text: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
flavor: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.

name: Brightwing
text: Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your_hand.
flavor: Little faerie dragons are made of sugar and spice and maniacal vice.

name: Coldlight Seer
text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +2 Health.
flavor: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths.  So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

name: Counterspell
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Deadly Shot
text: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Our ballista operator is effective, but not picky.

name: Demolisher
text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Laying siege isn't fun for anyone.  It's not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.

name: Eaglehorn Bow
text: [x]Whenever a friendly\nSecret is revealed,\ngain +1 Durability.
flavor: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

name: Earthen Ring Farseer
text: Battlecry: Restore #3_Health.
flavor: He can see really far, and he doesn't use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

name: Emperor Cobra
text: Poisonous
flavor: The Sholazar Basin is home to a lot of really horrible things. If you're going to visit, wear bug spray.  And plate armor.

name: Far Sight
text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

name: Felguard
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
flavor: Yes, he'll fight for you.  BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

name: Feral Spirit
text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (2)
flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

name: Flesheating Ghoul
text: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name.  It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

name: Frothing Berserker
text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

name: Harvest Golem
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/1 Damaged Golem.
flavor: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

name: Headcrack
text: Deal $2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
flavor: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

name: Ice Barrier
text: Secret: When your\nhero is attacked,\ngain 8 Armor.
flavor: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

name: Imp Master
text: [x]At the end of your turn, deal\n1 damage to this minion\n and summon a 1/1 Imp.
flavor: She would enjoy the job a lot more if she just could get the imps to QUIT BITING HER.

name: Injured Blademaster
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to HIMSELF.
flavor: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

name: Ironbeak Owl
text: Battlecry: Silence a_minion.
flavor: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

name: Jungle Panther
text: Stealth
flavor: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

name: King Mukla
text: Battlecry: Give your opponent 2 Bananas.
flavor: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

name: Kirin Tor Mage
text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret\nyou play this turn costs (0).
flavor: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

name: Lava Burst
text: Deal $5 damage. Overload: (2)
flavor: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

name: Lightning Storm
text: Deal $2-$3 damage to all_enemy minions. Overload: (2)
flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

name: Mana Tide Totem
text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavor: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

name: Mark of Nature
text: Choose One - Give a minion +4 Attack; or +4 Health and Taunt.
flavor: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature."  Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

name: Mirror Entity
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

name: Murloc Warleader
text: Your other Murlocs have +2 Attack.
flavor: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

name: Perdition's Blade
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Combo: Deal 2 instead.
flavor: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

name: Questing Adventurer
text: Whenever you play a card, gain +1/+1.
flavor: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

name: Raging Worgen
text: Has +1 Attack and Windfury while damaged.
flavor: If he's raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

name: Scarlet Crusader
text: Divine Shield
flavor: Never wash your whites with a Scarlet Crusader.

name: Sense Demons
text: Draw 2 Demons\nfrom your deck.
flavor: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

name: Shadow Madness
text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

name: SI:7 Agent
text: Combo: Deal 2 damage.
flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

name: Southsea Captain
text: Your other Pirates have +1/+1.
flavor: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat.  He has hat envy.

name: Spellbender
text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

name: Sword of Justice
text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1_Durability.
flavor: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

name: Tauren Warrior
text: Taunt\nHas +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

name: Thrallmar Farseer
text: Windfury
flavor: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

name: Tinkmaster Overspark
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform another random minion into a 5/5 Devilsaur or a 1/1 Squirrel.
flavor: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker's license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of '09.

name: Unbound Elemental
text: Whenever you play a card_with Overload, gain_+1/+1.
flavor: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

name: Unleash the Hounds
text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

name: Vaporize
text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
flavor: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

name: Void Terror
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy both\nadjacent minions and gain\n their Attack and Health.
flavor: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

name: Ancient Brewmaster
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavor: Most pandaren say his brew tastes like yak.  But apparently that's a compliment.

name: Ancient Mage
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent_minions Spell_Damage +1.
flavor: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

name: Arathi Weaponsmith
text: Battlecry: Equip a 2/2_weapon.
flavor: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

name: Bite
text: Give your hero +4_Attack this turn. Gain 4 Armor.
flavor: Chew your food!

name: Blade Flurry
text: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

name: Cone of Cold
text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal $1 damage to them.
flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

name: Cult Master
text: After a friendly minion dies, draw a card.
flavor: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

name: Dark Iron Dwarf
text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2_Attack this turn.
flavor: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore.  Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

name: Defender of Argus
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
flavor: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.

name: Dread Corsair
text: Taunt\nCosts (1) less per Attack of_your weapon.
flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

name: Edwin VanCleef
text: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each other card you've played this turn.
flavor: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

name: Equality
text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

name: Ethereal Arcanist
text: If you control a Secret at_the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
flavor: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

name: Keeper of the Grove
text: Choose One - Deal_2_damage; or Silence a minion.
flavor: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

name: Lightspawn
text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
flavor: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

name: Mass Dispel
text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

name: Master of Disguise
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.
flavor: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

name: Mindgames
text: Put a copy of\na random minion from\nyour opponent's deck into the battlefield.
flavor: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

name: Mogu'shan Warden
text: Taunt
flavor: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

name: Mortal Strike
text: Deal $4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $6 instead.
flavor: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

name: Pit Lord
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

name: Shadow Word: Ruin
text: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
flavor: Discovered by a worgen priest after a giant spilled a drink on her new white robes.

name: Shadowflame
text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

name: SI:7 Infiltrator
text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy Secret.
flavor: What will she destroy? It’s a secret!

name: Silvermoon Guardian
text: Divine Shield
flavor: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn’t go so well…

name: Soul of the Forest
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
flavor: "Reforestation" is suddenly a terrifying word.

name: Summoning Portal
text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
flavor: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!

name: Twilight Drake
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavor: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.

name: Violet Teacher
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
flavor: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.

name: Abomination
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 2\ndamage to ALL characters.
flavor: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

name: Bane of Doom
text: Deal $2 damage to_a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
flavor: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

name: Big Game Hunter
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
flavor: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

name: Blessed Champion
text: Double a minion's Attack.
flavor: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

name: Brawl
text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

name: Captain Greenskin
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1/+1.
flavor: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

name: Doomhammer
text: Windfury, Overload: (2)
flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

name: Druid of the Claw
text: [x]Choose One - Transform\ninto a 4/4 with Charge;\nor a 4/6 with Taunt.
flavor: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

name: Earth Elemental
text: Taunt\nOverload: (3)
flavor: Nothing beats rock.

name: Explosive Shot
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion and $2 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

name: Faceless Manipulator
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
flavor: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

name: Fen Creeper
text: Taunt
flavor: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast.   Boom, New Name!

name: Force of Nature
text: Summon three 2/2 Treants.
flavor: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

name: Harrison Jones
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
flavor: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

name: Holy Wrath
text: Draw a card and deal_damage equal to_its Cost.
flavor: C'mon Molten Giant!!

name: Righteousness
text: Give your minions Divine Shield.
flavor: Shield yourself in righteousness! It feels like a warm fuzzy blanket.

name: Silver Hand Knight
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2_Squire.
flavor: It's good to be a knight.   Less so to be one's squire.

name: Spiteful Smith
text: Your weapon has +2 Attack while this is damaged.
flavor: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

name: Stampeding Kodo
text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
flavor: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

name: Starfall
text: Choose One -\nDeal $5 damage to a minion; or $2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

name: Stranglethorn Tiger
text: Stealth
flavor: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

name: Temple Enforcer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

name: Venture Co. Mercenary
text: Your minions cost (3) more.
flavor: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

name: Argent Commander
text: Charge\nDivine Shield
flavor: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

name: Avenging Wrath
text: Deal $8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

name: Blizzard
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

name: Cabal Shadow Priest
text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
flavor: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

name: Cairne Bloodhoof
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/5 Baine Bloodhoof.
flavor: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

name: Frost Elemental
text: Battlecry: Freeze a_character.
flavor: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
flavor: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

name: Hogger
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with_Taunt.
flavor: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

name: Kidnapper
text: Combo: Return a minion to_its owner's hand.
flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

name: Nourish
text: Choose One - Gain 2_Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
flavor: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

name: Priestess of Elune
text: Battlecry: Restore #4 Health to your hero.
flavor: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

name: Savannah Highmane
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

name: Siphon Soul
text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to_your hero.
flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

name: Sunwalker
text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
flavor: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Don’t worry!

name: The Beast
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
flavor: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

name: The Black Knight
text: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

name: Windfury Harpy
text: Windfury
flavor: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

name: Xavius
text: After you play a card, summon a 2/1 Satyr.
flavor: Xavius has grand nightmares of summoning Sargeras into this world, but a few Satyr will have to do for now.

name: Ancient of Lore
text: Choose One - Draw a card; or Restore #5 Health.
flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

name: Ancient of War
text: Choose One -\n+5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

name: Archmage Antonidas
text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to_your hand.
flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

name: Baron Geddon
text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
flavor: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

name: Barrens Stablehand
text: Battlecry: Summon a random Beast.
flavor: It’s never Huffer.

name: Gladiator's Longbow
text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

name: Gorehowl
text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

name: High Inquisitor Whitemane
text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly minions that died_this turn.
flavor: No one told her that champions want to sleep in.

name: Ravenholdt Assassin
text: Stealth
flavor: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

name: Siegebreaker
text: Taunt\nYour other Demons have +1 Attack.
flavor: Has a side hustle as a siegebroker.

name: Al'Akir the Windlord
text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

name: Arcane Devourer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Likes her magic with a pinch of salt.

name: Gift of the Wild
text: Give your minions +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavor: The gift that keeps on living.

name: Grommash Hellscream
text: Charge\nHas +6 Attack while damaged.
flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

name: Gruul
text: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
flavor: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

name: Lay on Hands
text: Restore #8 Health. Draw_3 cards.
flavor: A grammatically awkward life saver.

name: Natalie Seline
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and gain its Health.
flavor: She discovered Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire, a terrible weapon of shadow magic that could both swallow a soul and cut a mean julienne.

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3_Ashbringer.
flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions.
flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Alexstrasza
text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
flavor: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

name: Cenarius
text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

name: King Krush
text: Charge
flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

name: Lord Jaraxxus
text: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

name: Malygos
text: Spell Damage +5
flavor: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

name: Nozdormu
text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their_turns.
flavor: Time to write some flavor text.

name: Onyxia
text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
flavor: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

name: Ysera
text: At the end of your turn, add_a Dream Card to_your hand.
flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

name: Deathwing
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your_hand.
flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

name: Pyroblast
text: Deal $10 damage.
flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

name: Sea Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
flavor: See?  Giant.

name: Ancestral Healing
text: Restore a minion\nto full Health and\ngive it Taunt.
flavor: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

name: Backstab
text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

name: Innervate
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Moonfire
text: Deal $1 damage.
flavor: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

name: Power Word: Shield
text: Give a minion +2_Health.
flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

name: Sacrificial Pact
text: Destroy a friendly Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

name: Totemic Might
text: Give your Totems +2_Health.
flavor: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

name: Arcane Missiles
text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

name: Arcane Shot
text: Deal $2 damage.
flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

name: Blessing of Might
text: Give a minion +3_Attack.
flavor: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

name: Charge
text: Give a friendly minion Charge. It can't attack heroes this turn.
flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

name: Claw
text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor.
flavor: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

name: Corruption
text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOOM!  Corrupted!

name: Deadly Poison
text: Give your weapon +2_Attack.
flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

name: Elven Archer
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.

name: Frost Shock
text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
flavor: FROST SHOCK!

name: Goldshire Footman
text: Taunt
flavor: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

name: Grimscale Oracle
text: Your other Murlocs have +1 Attack.
flavor: These are the brainy murlocs.  It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

name: Hand of Protection
text: Give a minion Divine Shield.
flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

name: Holy Smite
text: Deal $3 damage\nto a minion.
flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

name: Humility
text: Change a minion's Attack to 1.
flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

name: Light's Justice
flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

name: Mind Vision
text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
flavor: I see what you did there.

name: Mirror Image
text: Summon two 0/2 minions with Taunt.
flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

name: Mortal Coil
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

name: Murloc Raider
flavor: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

name: Psychic Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
flavor: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

name: Radiance
text: Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: Because you're worth it!

name: Shadowhoof Slayer
text: Battlecry: Give your hero +1_Attack this turn.
flavor: Was a humble Elven Archer before Sargeras got to him.

name: Sinister Strike
text: Deal $3 damage to the_enemy hero.
flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

name: Soulfire
text: [x]Deal $4 damage.\nDiscard a random card.
flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

name: Stonetusk Boar
text: Charge
flavor: This card is boaring.

name: Timber Wolf
text: Your other Beasts have +1_Attack.
flavor: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

name: Tracking
text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the_others.
flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Voidwalker
text: Taunt
flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

name: Voodoo Doctor
text: Battlecry: Restore #2_Health.
flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

name: Whirlwind
text: Deal $1 damage to ALL_minions.
flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

name: Acidic Swamp Ooze
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavor: Oozes love Flamenco.  Don't ask.

name: Arcane Explosion
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

name: Bloodfen Raptor
flavor: "Kill 30 raptors." - Hemet Nesingwary

name: Bluegill Warrior
text: Charge
flavor: He just wants a hug.   A sloppy... slimy... hug.

name: Chaos Strike
text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Draw a card.
flavor: "What do we want?" "CHAOS!"\n "When do we want it?"\n "WHEN LEAST EXPECTED!"

name: Cleave
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to\ntwo random enemy\nminions.
flavor: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

name: Execute
text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

name: Felstalker
text: Battlecry: Discard a random card.
flavor: This puppy chews up cards instead of shoes.

name: Frostbolt
text: Deal $3 damage to a_character and Freeze it.
flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

name: Frostwolf Grunt
text: Taunt
flavor: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that.   It's more than just a job.

name: Heroic Strike
text: Give your hero +4_Attack this turn.
flavor: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

name: Holy Light
text: Restore #6 Health.
flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

name: Hunter's Mark
text: Change a minion's Health to 1.
flavor: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

name: Kobold Geomancer
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

name: Mark of the Wild
text: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+2.\n(+2 Attack/+2 Health)
flavor: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

name: Murloc Tidehunter
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1_Murloc Scout.
flavor: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

name: Novice Engineer
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavor: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

name: River Crocolisk
flavor: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

name: Rockbiter Weapon
text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

name: Sap
text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor: Rogues love sappy movies.

name: Shadow Word: Death
text: Destroy a minion with 5_or more Attack.
flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

name: Shadow Word: Pain
text: Destroy a minion with 3_or less Attack.
flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

name: Shiv
text: Deal $1 damage.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Rogues are experts at SHIV-al-ry.

name: Sightless Watcher
text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards in your deck. Choose one to put on top.
flavor: What he lacks in sight, he makes up for in sleight-of-tentacle tricks.

name: Windfury
text: Give a minion Windfury.
flavor: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

name: Aldrachi Warblades
text: Lifesteal
flavor: The ancient Aldrachi were the greatest warriors in the universe. Imagine their power if they'd put the handle at the END of the blade.

name: Animal Companion
text: Summon a random Beast Companion.
flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

name: Arcane Intellect
text: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

name: Coordinated Strike
text: Summon three 1/1_Illidari with Rush.
flavor: Undisputed champions of "Dancing with the Satyrs."

name: Dalaran Mage
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

name: Drain Life
text: Deal $2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.
flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

name: Fan of Knives
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw_a card.
flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

name: Fiery War Axe
flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

name: Flametongue Totem
text: Adjacent minions have +2_Attack.
flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Frost Nova
text: Freeze all enemy minions.
flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

name: Healing Touch
text: Restore #8 Health.
flavor: 8 Health, no waiting.

name: Ironforge Rifleman
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

name: Ironfur Grizzly
text: Taunt
flavor: "Bear Carcass 1/10"

name: Kill Command
text: Deal $3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal\n$5 damage instead.
flavor: "Kill!", he commanded.

name: Magma Rager
flavor: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

name: Raid Leader
text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.
flavor: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

name: Razorfen Hunter
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1_Boar.
flavor: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once.  ONCE.

name: Satyr Overseer
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 2/2 Satyr.
flavor: What he lacks in communication skills, he makes up for with highly responsive staffing allocations.

name: Savage Roar
text: Give your characters +2_Attack this turn.
flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

name: Shadow Bolt
text: Deal $4 damage\nto a minion.
flavor: It’s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

name: Shattered Sun Cleric
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

name: Shield Block
text: Gain 5 Armor.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

name: Silverback Patriarch
text: Taunt
flavor: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

name: Soul Cleave
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $2 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavor: The way to a demon's soul is through its stomach.

name: Warsong Commander
text: Your Charge minions have +1 Attack.
flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

name: Wild Growth
text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

name: Wolfrider
text: Charge
